name: Supervised administration; interim orders; distribution and closing orders Control, and Termination of Authority
text: §560:3-505  Supervised administration; interim orders; distribution and closing orders.  Unless otherwise ordered by the court, supervised administration is terminated by order in accordance with time restrictions, notices and contents of orders prescribed for proceedings under section 560:3-1001.  Interim orders approving or directing partial distributions or granting other relief may be issued by the court at any time during the pendency of a supervised administration on the application of the personal representative or any interested person. [L 1996, c 288, pt of §1]
